Four Days of Go   opinion 
In-depth thoughts from an experienced developer new to Go. “If I had to guess, I’d say the Go gopher suffers from a mild form of autism. I get the same feeling about the Go language [.. but] despite my misgivings [,] I’ve been enjoying my initial experiences.”
Evan Miller
